thread.section_title: Hotel Tourisme Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect hotel for exploring Paris
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel for exploring Paris - Review of Hotel Tourisme Avenue, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eatsoutalotingalway
title: Perfect hotel for exploring Paris
text:
This was our first trip to Paris and really wasn't sure about choosing a location that would suit all sightseeing, this hotel ticked all the boxes. It was so near everything and with a metro outside the door you can access the entire city.
The hotel itself was very clean, the rooms are a bit small but really well kept. The warm welcome we received from the girl we met on arrival was excellent and she had customer focused approach of a receptionist that wanted to help in every way giving us a map and how to get to nearby attractions.
The hotel is located in an area with lovely places within walking distance to eat and drink, I would definetly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Paris
